description: Defines the Note data model used in the app state and UI, including properties for note details, methods for copying, serialization/deserialization, and a computed color property.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A class representing a note with properties such as id, title, content, color, pinned status, and timestamps, including methods for copying and converting to/from database format.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with optionally updated fields.

methods.name: toDb
methods.description: Converts the Note object into a Map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: fromDb
methods.description: Creates a Note instance from a Map retrieved from the database.
